roleset.name: span a distance (NOT areas/places)

roles.note: This should not be used for a physical location (ie 'empty space', outer space, personal space, office space, parking space, space to grow, etc. Honestly, most of these will be .YY. )

example.name: Arg 1
example.text: Then , in the space of a 20 - minute coffee break , the average rallied almost all of the way back .

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie.
